name: Kirby: The Dreamland Effect
storyline:
All is peaceful in Dreamland thanks to the six Starlight Gems, but danger is approaching quickly...
...And when a shooting star streaks across the sky and crashes - the world is covered in darkness.

When The darkness clears, the people of Dreamland find that the Starlight Gems have gone missing! and whats more - Strange Creatures have appeared and have begun to wreck havoc!

Help us Kirby!
